Entries.{{ModId}}_MiyoungMeddling/Friendship Jon:
jaunty
			/7 9 
			/LaniSBV 9 14 1 Jonghyuk 10 15 0 MiyoungSBV 2 5 0 
			/skippable
			/pause 500
			/playSound drumkit6
			/playSound drumkit6
			/playSound drumkit6
			/speak MiyoungSBV "Do you two want spinach on your sandwiches?"
			/pause 500
			/textAboveHead LaniSBV "Yes please!"
			/pause 200
			/textAboveHead Jonghyuk "Yes!"
			/pause 500
			/beginSimultaneousCommand
				/playSound breakingGlass
				/textAboveHead MiyoungSBV "Ouch!"
				/jump MiyoungSBV 8
			/endSimultaneousCommand
			/pause 500
			/beginSimultaneousCommand
				/emote LaniSBV 16
				/emote Jonghyuk 16
			/endSimultaneousCommand
			/pause 200
			/speed LaniSBV 5
			/move LaniSBV -2 0 3
			/speed LaniSBV 5
			/move LaniSBV 0 -8 0 true
			/speak LaniSBV "Miyoung! Are you okay?!"
			/faceDirection MiyoungSBV 2
			/shake MiyoungSBV 500
			/speed LaniSBV 5
			/move LaniSBV -4 0 0 true
			/speak LaniSBV "Oh, no, you're bleeding! Um, crap, where are your bandages?!"
			/move LaniSBV 0 -1 3 true
			/pause 500
			/speak MiyoungSBV "Oh, hush, it's really not that bad. I'll just put a rag on it until the bleeding stops."
			/speak LaniSBV "And then put a bandage on it after, okay? I'll finish up the sandwiches, you go sit down."
			/speak MiyoungSBV "Sweetie, are you sure? I really don't mind-"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 60
			/speak LaniSBV "Yes, I'm sure! Go sit down, young lady."
			/speak MiyoungSBV "You rascal. Okay, okay, I'm going."
			/advancedMove MiyoungSBV false 0 1 5 0 0 7 4 0 0 1 3 100
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 0
			/playSound drumkit6
			/playSound drumkit6
			/playSound drumkit6
			/emote Jonghyuk 12
			/speak Jonghyuk "Are you alright? You freaked me out for a second there!"
			/speak MiyoungSBV "Yes, I'm alright. Lani made sure to scold me already."
			/playSound sipTea
			/playSound drumkit6
			/playSound dwop
			/pause 500
			/emote MiyoungSBV 40
			/pause 500
			/emote MiyoungSBV 16
			/speak MiyoungSBV "Lani's such a nice girl, isn't she?"
			/playSound drumkit6
			/playSound drumkit6
			/pause 1000
			/speak Jonghyuk "Yeah, she really is."
			/pause 500
			/emote MiyoungSBV 40
			/pause 1000
			/speak MiyoungSBV "It's a wonder a sweet girl like her is still single."
			/pause 500
			/playSound dwop
			/playSound drumkit6
			/speak Jonghyuk "Yeah."
			/pause 1000
			/emote Jonghyuk 40
			/pause 1000
			/speak Jonghyuk "...Huh.#$b#...#$b#..?#$b#..."
			/pause 1000
			/playSound sipTea
			/playSound dwop
			/playSound jingle1
			/playSound discoverMineral
			/pause 100
			/speak LaniSBV "Sandwiches are ready! Come eat!"
			/beginSimultaneousCommand
				/move Jonghyuk -3 0 0 true
				/move MiyoungSBV 0 -1 0 true
			/endSimultaneousCommand
			/addConversationTopic {{ModId}}_Jonghyuk2Heart 27
			/globalFade
			/viewport move -100 -100 1000
			/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_NightlyReturn/Friendship Jongh:
none
			/75 37
			/Jonghyuk 74 32 2 LaniSBV 75 32 2
			/addTemporaryActor LCritter 32 32 -999 -999 1 false character
			/skippable
			/pause 500
			/move LaniSBV 0 4 2 Jonghyuk 0 4 2
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 32
			/speak LaniSBV "Woah. Look at the moon. It looks gorgeous tonight!" --viewport pans up, switches to a map that just displays the moon for three seconds, then pans back down to lani and Hyuk
			/emote LaniSBV 20
			/pause 1000
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 3
			/pause 500
			/faceDirection Jonghyuk 1
			/emote Jonghyuk 8
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "Thank you for hanging out with me tonight. I really appreciate it."
			/speak Jonghyuk "Of course! I'm always down to spend time with you."
			/speak LaniSBV "You didn't have to walk me home...#$b#But I appreciate it."
			/emote Jonghyuk 60
			/speak Jonghyuk "Ah, it's nothing much. Just want you to be safe."
			/emote LaniSBV 60
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 40
			/pause 500
			/doAction 72 41
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 2
			/faceDirection Jonghyuk 2
			/emote LaniSBV 8
			/emote Jonghyuk 8
			/pause 1000
			/doAction 72 41
			/pause 250
			/emote LaniSBV 16
			/jump LaniSBV 8
			/shake LaniSBV 1000
			/pause 500
			/doAction 72 41
			/textAboveHead LaniSBV "AH!"
			/jump LaniSBV 3
			/jump Jonghyuk 1
			/positionOffset Jonghyuk 5 3
			/doAction 72 41
			/doAction 72 41
			/pause 100
			/warp LCritter 71 41 true
			/speed LCritter 5
			/advancedMove LCritter false 200 0 0 1 0 3
			/pause 1000
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 3
			/faceDirection Jonghyuk 1
			/pause 250
			/emote LaniSBV 40
			/emote Jonghyuk 40
			/pause 1000
			/jump LaniSBV 3
			/positionOffset LaniSBV 10 0
			/jump Jonghyuk 3
			/positionOffset Jonghyuk -10 0
			/pause 500
			/textAboveHead Jonghyuk "Sorry..."
			/pause 500
			/textAboveHead LaniSBV "U-Um..."
			/pause 1000
			/speak LaniSBV "Thank you for, uh, protecting me from... well, what turned out to be a rabbit."
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "I'd always protect you regardless of what's out there."
			/pause 1000
			/speak LaniSBV "You mean that?"
			/speak Jonghyuk "Course I do."
			/emote LaniSBV 60
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "I-- Um, I guess we should..."
			/speak Jonghyuk "Yeah. I'll finish walking you home."
			/speed LaniSBV 2
			/speed Jonghyuk 2
			/move LaniSBV 0 11 2 Jonghyuk 0 11 2 true
			/addConversationTopic {{ModId}}_Jonghyuk6Heart 27
			/globalFade
			/viewport move -100 -100 1000
			/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_LoveIsWar/Friendship Jonghyuk:
jaunty
			/18 67
			/LaniSBV 17 67 2 farmer 19 59 2
			/skippable
			/move farmer 0 8 2
			/textAboveHead LaniSBV "Hey! You came!"
			/emote farmer 8
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "So, you're probably wondering why I called you out here."
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 40
			/pause 500
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 1
			/speak LaniSBV "Are you, uh... interested in anybody?$7"
			/pause 500
			/faceDirection farmer 3
			/emote farmer 8
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "Perhaps a certain mysterious brunette named Jonghyuk?$7"
			/pause 300
			/emote farmer 40
			/pause 500
			/jump farmer 5
			/emote farmer 16
			/question fork1 "Do you like Jonghyuk romantically?
				#Yes
				#No"
			/fork {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_No
			/pause 400 --Answer 1: Yes (ends event)
			/speak LaniSBV "Oh. Uh... this is awkward, because I like Jonghyuk too.$7"
			/pause 500
			/question null "#I'm seriously pursuing him, so back off#May the best man win!"
			/speak LaniSBV "...Um, sure. Fine. So much for friendship, I guess.$2#$b#I'll give you one week. After that, you're out of luck.$13"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 28
			/move farmer 0 -8 0
			/friendship LaniSBV -125 --Half a heart
			/addConversationTopic {{ModId}}_LoveRivals 6
			/globalFade
			/viewport move -100 -100 1000
			/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_No:
speak LaniSBV "Oh, thank Yoba. I thought I was gonna have to compete with you or something!$1"
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 2
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "Honestly, I'm still unsure of what to call my feelings for him.$2#$b#I know I like him and want to be serious with him...$12"
			/question fork1 "Should I go for it?#Sure, why not#No, you shouldn't"
			/fork {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_No2
			/pause 500 --Answer 1: Sure, why not (ends event)
			/emote LaniSBV 20
			/speak LaniSBV "You're right. Why not? I'm gonna do it.$1"
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "I think I needed that push to make it all come into focus. I'm gonna go do it before I lose my nerve.$12"
			/move LaniSBV 0 -3 0
			/pause 300
			/textAboveHead LaniSBV "Wait!"
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 2
			/speak LaniSBV "Thank you so much, @!$1#$b#You're the best!$4"
			/jump LaniSBV 5
			/emote LaniSBV 56
			/move LaniSBV 1 0 1
			/move LaniSBV 0 -8 0
			/addMailReceived {{ModId}}_LoveRouteCompleted
			/globalFade
			/viewport -1000 -1000
			/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_No2:
pause 200
			/emote LaniSBV 8
			/speak LaniSBV "What? Why not? I'm pretty sure it's mutual...$2"
			/pause 500
			/quickQuestion "Tell me why I shouldn't.#Figure out your feelings first before doing anything#Because you're not good enough for him#I lied, I actually like Jonghyuk#He's not good enough for you(break)
			/switchEvent {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_FigureItOut (break)
			/switchEvent {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_UrBad (break)
			/switchEvent {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_Liar (break)
			/switchEvent {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_HeBad
Entries.{{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_UrBad:
pause 200
			/speak LaniSBV "I thought friends supported each other, but I guess not.$17"
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "Wow. I really thought... After everything I shared with you..?$18#$b#That hurts. But...$18#$b#Now I know I don't need to take advice from someone like you.$17#$b#...$19"
			/friendship LaniSBV -750 // 3 hearts
			/addMailReceived {{ModId}}_LoveRouteCompleted
			/switchEvent {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_End
Entries.{{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_HeBad:
pause 200
			/speak LaniSBV "Thanks for the commentary.$13#$b#Great thing it's not your choice who I fall in love with!$5"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 12
			/pause 1000
			/emote LaniSBV 28
			/speak LaniSBV "I thought you of all people would know better than to judge a book by its cover.$13#$b#I guess I was wrong.$2#$b#I like him, and I'm gonna make him happy. Bye, @.$13"
			/friendship LaniSBV -250 // 1 heart
			/addMailReceived {{ModId}}_LoveRouteCompleted
			/switchEvent {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_End
Entries.{{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_FigureItOut:
pause 200
			/speak LaniSBV "Yeah, you're probably right, as much as I hate to admit it.$7"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 40
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "I'll take some time to think about how I feel. Thanks, @.$12#$b#I'll see you later, yeah?"
			/switchEvent {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_End
Entries.{{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_Liar:
pause 200
			/speak LaniSBV "You're such a...$5#$b#...$13#$b#Are you serious? Really, @?$5"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 12
			/speak LaniSBV "You're a piece of work.$13#$b#Can't believe I thought you'd take this seriously.$13"
			/friendship LaniSBV -250 // 1 heart
			/addConversationTopic {{ModId}}_LoveRivals 7
			/switchEvent {{ModId}}_LoveIsWar_End

Entries.{{ModId}}_Embarasxxx/LocalMail {{ModId}}:
none
			/-100 -100
			/farmer 10 15 0 LaniSBV 10 5 1 Jonghyuk 11 5 3
			/skippable
			/pause 1500
			/message "Why is the door locked?"
			/pause 1000
			/message "Are those... voices?"
			/pause 1000
			/message "*giggles* Jonghyuk, that tickles..."
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "But you like it though, right?$h"
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "You're adorable when you're flustered, Lani."
			/pause 1000
			/speak LaniSBV "And you're insatiable."
			/pause 500
			/playSound clubhit
			/playSound clubhit
			/playSound clubhit
			/pause 1000
			/speak LaniSBV "Hyuk -- someone's at the door."
			/pause 750
			/speak Jonghyuk "So? They can wait.#$b#I'm busy with my favorite girl."
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "You--!#$b#..."
			/pause 1000
			/playSound clubhit
			/playSound clubSmash
			/playSound doorOpen
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "They're coming in! Put your shirt on at least--"
			/pause 500
			/viewport 10 8 
			/playMusic jaunty
			/playSound doorCreak
			/jump LaniSBV 8
			/positionOffset LaniSBV -15 0
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 2
			/move farmer 0 -7 0 
			/emote LaniSBV 16
			/pause 500
			/emote farmer 8
			/pause 1000
			/shake LaniSBV 250
			/speak LaniSBV "Oh, heeey, @... Lovely to see you here...#$b#Eh hem.#$b#We definitely weren't doing anything when you knocked.#$b#Nope.#$b#Nothing at all."
			/pause 500
			/positionOffset Jonghyuk -20 0
			/pause 100
			/emote LaniSBV 60
			/pause 500
			/faceDirection Jonghyuk 2
			/speak Jonghyuk "Did you need something, @?#$b#My girlfriend and I were in the middle of something important, so..."
			/pause 250
			/speak LaniSBV "*muttering* Oh my Yoba, I'm never living this down."
			/question null "#I'll just come back later...#You two have fun... and use protection!"
			/speak Jonghyuk "Oh, I can't make any promises on that."
			/pause 250
			/emote LaniSBV 16
			/pause 500
			/emote farmer 60
			/setRunning farmer
			/move farmer 0 6 2
			/playSound doorCreakReverse
			/pause 100
			/warp farmer -100 -100
			/playSound doorClose
			/pause 1000
			/faceDirection Jonghyuk 3
			/pause 100
			/emote Jonghyuk 32
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "Now, where were we?"
			/pause 500
			/faceDirection LaniSBV 1
			/pause 100
			/showFrame Jonghyuk 28
			/showFrame LaniSBV 28
			/globalFade
			/viewport move -100 -100 1000
			/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_DWST/Friendship Jonghyuk 1000/:
jaunty
			/13 19
			/LaniSBV 13 20 1 Jonghyuk 14 20 3 Gus 11 18 2 Emily 17 17 0
			/skippable
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "Hey, Gus, let me get a...$1"
			/pause 500
			/speak Gus "Sure thing, Jonghyuk. Comin' right up!"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 8
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "What drink is that? I've never heard of it. Can I try it?$16"
			/pause 500
			/faceDirection Jonghyuk 3
			/pause 500
			/emote Jonghyuk 40
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "I dunno, you're kinda small, you've already had a few, and the drink's pretty strong...$2"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 60
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "I can take it!$9"
			/pause 500
			/emote Jonghyuk 60
			/faceDirection Jonghyuk 0
			/speak Jonghyuk "Gus, make it two!$1"
			/pause 500
			/speak Gus "On it!"
			/pause 1000
			/faceDirection Gus 0
			/playSound bubbles
			/playSound bubbles
			/playSound Milking
			/playSound Milking
			/faceDirection Gus 2
			/speak Gus "Here ya go."
			/playSound coin
			/addObject 13 18 346 2
			/playSound coin
			/addObject 14 18 346 2
			/pause 500
			/textAboveHead Jonghyuk "Cheers!"
			/textAboveHead LaniSBV "Cheers!"
			/pause 500
			/animate LaniSBV false false 125 32 33 34 35 35 35 35 35 34 33 32
			/playSound gulp
			/pause 1000
			/shake LaniSBV 1000
			/pause 500
			/emote Jonghyuk 32
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "You didn't tell me it'd taste like literal fire!$14"
			/speak Jonghyuk "I told you it was strong!$3"
			/pause 500
			/animate LaniSBV false false 125 32 33 34 35 35 35 35 35 34 33 32
			/playSound gulp
			/pause 500
			/shake LaniSBV 500
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "Any better?$8"
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "No. Worse. Much, much worse.$15"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 28
			/speak Jonghyuk "Oh, poor baby.$4"
			/speak LaniSBV "...Shut up.$15"
			/pause 500
			/emote Jonghyuk 56
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "Lani, are you blushing?$1"
			/speak LaniSBV "No, I'm drunk! I'm drunk.$10"
			/speak Jonghyuk "Uh huuuuh.$1"
			/pause 1000
			/emote LaniSBV 40
			/pause 250
			/animate LaniSBV false false 125 32 33 34 35 35 35 35 35 35 35 35 35 35 35 35 34 33 32
			/playSound gulp
			/playSound gulp
			/playSound gulp
			/emote Jonghyuk 16
			/speak Jonghyuk "What the hell?! Are you okay?$7"
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "...Yeah.$15"
			/pause 500
			/emote LaniSBV 40
			/emote Jonghyuk 40
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "Has anyone ever told you your eyes are beautiful?$9"
			/emote Jonghyuk 32
			/pause 500
			/speak Jonghyuk "Oh my Yoba. No way. You were totally fine a minute ago!$11"
			/speak LaniSBV "I was faking it, man! I'm barely hangin' on! We had so many drinks before this! And you're makin' me nervous!$8"
			/speak Jonghyuk "I make you nervous?$8"
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "...Pretty boys make me nervous. Stop lookin' at me.$15"
			/emote Jonghyuk 32
			/speak Jonghyuk "You think I'm pretty?$9"
			/speak LaniSBV "Um, duh? Look in the mirror.$15"
			/pause 500
			/emote Jonghyuk 20
			/pause 500
			/speak LaniSBV "Y'need to keep drinking so you can forget me saying this stuff tomorrow.$8"
			/speak Jonghyuk "Whatever the princess wants~$1"
			/emote LaniSBV 60
			/speak LaniSBV "Shuddup.$16"
			/emote Jonghyuk 56
			/playSound gulp 
			/addConversationTopic {{ModId}}_Jonghyuk4Heart 27
			/globalFade
			/viewport move -100 -100 1000
			/end
